EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-11-16-IndyInvite.ES-2018-11-16 Indy Event invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Dinner on 12/6?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I’m planning to be in Indianapolis on December 6th, and will be hosting a dinner for local IT leaders. I would love if you could join me.
Not only will we treat you to a delicious meal at Vida, but you’ll have the chance to network with your peers on topics such as:
- Accelerating your public cloud migration projects - Continuously optimizing your IT infrastructure - And much more
Will you join me? Seats are filling up fast, click here to reserve your spot at dinner <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-indy/]]>.
Best, Steve
Steve Corndell General Manager and Vice President Commercial Sales, Americas Email: steve.corndell@turbonomic.com Cell: 774-273-0056 Office: 781-418-5232
